Tagline: Engineering, maritime, oil & gas, and power solutions delivered with safety, precision, and sustainability.
AboutText: NIPOJ GLOBAL SERVICES LIMITED was established in 2003 as an indigenous engineering and technical services company providing support services to the Maritime, Oil & Gas, and Power sectors. The company is committed to delivering sustainable infrastructure solutions through highly skilled professionals, modern technology, and operational excellence.
MissionText: Our mission is to provide world-class engineering, maritime, oil & gas, and power transmission services that meet international standards while promoting safety, efficiency, and environmental responsibility. We are dedicated to delivering reliable power transmission and renewable energy solutions that support industrial growth and community development.

Services.Category: Maritime & Oil and Gas Support Services
Services.Description: Provision of marine logistics, offshore support, oil field services, asset protection, inspection, maintenance, and operational support to oil & gas facilities and maritime operations.
Professional diving operations, underwater inspection, maintenance and repair (IMR), subsea installation, and marine construction support executed with strict safety standards.
Engineering solutions for power transmission infrastructure, renewable energy systems, grid support services, and sustainable energy development projects.
